GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix queue selection for mesh/OCB interfaces

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit e013ea2a51a94b903b396a8dff531a07d470335d. For more details please see the references link.
